item.title: About THITAart and Thita
item.description:
Hi! I’m Thita,

I’m passionate about art, comics, 3D modeling, and game development. As a digital creator, I’ve established this website, THITAart, to share my experiences, resources, and projects. If you’re looking for guidance on:
